title: What are the reasons to choose a Roku Ultra over an Apple TV? - Quora

response.answer_text: The two that come to mind would be platform and cost. Roku is more of an open, non-biased platform. While it’s true you’re going to find the “big” services on both (Netflix, Hulu, and now even Amazon Prime Video) Apple has a vested interest in the way Apple TV works. While I’d not anticipate anything happening anytime in the near future to “threaten” a relationship with Apple, Roku is more platform agnostic. You don’t really hear about disagreements between Roku and Amazon like you do Apple and Amazon. Heck, it’s only been in the last week or so that Apple FINALLY got the Prime Video app. Then there’s cost. Right now, you can get a Roku Ultra on Amazon for about half the cost of an Apple TV.
